recipesJson.name: Strawlicious Suckle Cheescake
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description:
A bright Strawberry cheesecake Ice cream with perfect Subtle floral note. Taste good of the Shake. Give it 3-5 days for all the creams to meld together to make it perfection. 
Sweet Strawberry: A Very candy like strawberry with a syrupy backbone to it and brings in a ton of flavor to the mix.
FA Juicy Strawberry: This taste like Ripe strawberry but with a bit more juicy ness that you get from a real Strawberry.
TFA Cheesecake Graham cracker crust: This has a nice subtle graham crust to it , while adding a rich, milky, thick creamy cheesecake flavor.
TFA Sweet Cream: Brings in a heavier cream base that is sweet and has a nice cheesy taste to it to ehance the Cheesecake.
TFA Vanilla Custard: at just a very low percentage does not take over the mix and does not add to steep time but adds just a nice buttery brightness to the mix.
HS french Vanilla Bean ice cream.: a Thick creamy ice cream that almost leaves a Buttermilk taste to the recipe. Pairs very welll here.
FLV Cream: Creamy, light vanilla and Milky a must have to really represent the dairy notes to the recipe. 
TFA Honeysuckle: This adds a nice sweet delectable bit of floral ness to they recipe while adding hints of honey. Itâ€™s a great addition to the Strawberries.
Cap Supersweet: This makes the recipe Shine more and create a bit more vibrancy. 
What you left with after a good 5 day Steep is a nice Strawberries and Cream cheesecake with hints of honey, thick milk, butter and a cream flavor that is so delicious you be coming back for more. Feedback is encouraged. Thanks and Happy Vaping.

reviews.text: Perfect mix for when you want something thick and rich, yet light enough on flavor to be a summertime ADV
